content: every 2pss 2pss 1ps into the next work another 2pss st then 1ps between the next 2pss in the first space between 2pss yarn over and pull through 4 times immediately yarn over and pull through 4 times into the next space between 2pss yarn over and pull through all loops on the hook repeat another time connect with the tie to close the headband by making 3hdcs into the three sts in the middle thank you thank you so much for choosing the sheafband pattern i hope you have fun making it and that it becomes a go-to accessory for those spring days whether it s the perfect pop of design for your outfit or a thoughtful gift for someone special i hope it brings a little extra warmth and joy to your days ahead follow us on instagram @yarnseed for more patterns and inspiration page 5 a quick note on usage feel free to sell the finished items you make using this pattern just please give credit to yarnseed as the designer the pattern itself is for personal use only so please don t copy share or sell it you may also like welcome spring scrunchy - a fun fresh accessory to brighten your spring look winter flower beret with beginners guide - a refined beret with a delicate floral design paired with a comprehensive beginner-friendly guide the verdant hat - a charming cloche hat adorned with delicate green leaves evoking a graceful nature-inspired elegance
